Law & Order: UK is a British police procedural and legal television programme, adapted from the American TV series Law & Order. 

Based in London, and following the formula of the original, Law & Order: UK stars Bradley Walsh, Jamie Bamber, Harriet Walter, Ben Daniels, Freema Agyeman, and Bill Paterson.
